basic_info.description: I am Tsay Yong, a video producer and content creator, currently based in Singapore. I ran a Gaming YouTube Channel, which I started in 2017, that to date has gained over 17,000 subscribers, 3,000,000 views and over 10,000,000 minutes of watch-time. My area of expertise lies with video editing, where I possess over 6 years of hands-on experience. I am well-versed in utilizing platforms like Sony Vegas Pro and Adobe After Effects, which are my primary tools for crafting captivating visuals. With exposure to a content writing internship, I have tons of experience dealing with digital media and know the key metrics that drive clicks and hold attention in a digital space.
basic_info.description_2: Having run a decently successful YouTube channel and substantial knowledge with software engineering, I am familiar with all sides of the coin when it comes to successful and effective digital marketing. With my recent experience covering media for the Singapore Army, I have the required understanding to edit your montages, wedding videos or movies - with added effects too!
basic_info.description_bold: I am excited to bring your visions and ideas to life.

projects.title: 99.co
projects.description: As a content writer, I wrote articles for 99.co regarding housing and development, to drive traffic to the 99.co site. This is part of their Search Engine Optimization Effort.

projects.title: Binner
projects.description: A Minecraft YouTube channel that I started in 2017. It was a fun journey making content on YouTube and slowly gaining a following. My content started out being general Minecraft gigs, but eventually specialized into Hypixel Skyblock as the gamemode was attracting a lot of attention. To date, the channel has gained over 17,000 subscribers, 3,000,000 views and over 10,000,000 minutes of watchtime.

projects.title: Video Producer @ SAF
projects.description: I produced video content that documented the journey of NSFs completing their National Service in 2nd Battalion Singapore Infantry Regiment. I also produced video highlights of key bilateral exercises between Singapore and its neighboring countries, as well as Change of Command videos, which feature well wishes for commanders as a heartfelt farewell after their completion of their tour of duty.

experience.title: Video Producer
achievements: Produce videos featuring the journey of NSFs in 2 SIR
Won Commanding Officer Coin for covering Exercise Maju Bersama, a bilateral exercise between Singapore and Brunei

experience.title: Binner - A Minecraft Channel
achievements: A Minecraft Channel that focused on Hypixel Skyblock, a MMORPG built in Minecraft

experience.title: Content Writer
achievements: Wrote articles for 99.co regarding housing and development
